packages.name: Basic Fun Package
packages.description: Access to all indoor play areas, small or large jump house based on age, themed tableware (plates, napkins, balloons), free gift for the birthday child.

packages.name: Deluxe Party Package
packages.description: Everything in the Basic Package, PLUS: Catered Pizza (2 large), juice boxes for each child, chips/snack bags, party favors for each child, party host assistance.
addOns: Small or large jump house based on age
Free gift for the birthday child
